translations.Saved with error: Collabora Online shoul: Saved with error: Collabora Online should expose the same protocol as the server installation. Please check the ssl.enable and ssl.termination settings of your Collabora Online server.
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: The file was only partially uploaded
translations.Could not write file to disk: Could not write file to disk
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: A PHP extension stopped the file upload
translations.No file uploaded or file size exceeds ma: No file uploaded or file size exceeds maximum of %s
translations.Only template files can be uploaded: Only template files can be uploaded
translations.Edit office documents directly in your b: Edit office documents directly in your browser.
translations.This application can connect to a Collab:
This application can connect to a Collabora Online (or other) server (WOPI-like Client). Nextcloud is the WOPI Host. Please read the documentation to learn more about that.

You can also edit your documents off-line with the Collabora Office app from the **[Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.collabora.libreoffice)** and **[iOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/collabora-office/id1440482071)** store.
translations.Nextcloud Office is a powerful Collabora: Nextcloud Office is a powerful Collabora Online based online office suite with collaborative editing, which supports all major documents, spreadsheet and presentation file formats and works together with all modern browsers.
translations.Collabora Online is a powerful LibreOffi: Collabora Online is a powerful LibreOffice-based online office suite with collaborative editing, which supports all major documents, spreadsheet and presentation file formats and works together with all modern browsers.
translations.You have not configured the allow-list f: You have not configured the allow-list for WOPI requests. Without this setting users may download restricted files via WOPI requests to the Nextcloud server.
translations.Could not establish connection to the Co: Could not establish connection to the Collabora Online server. This might be due to a missing configuration of your web server. For more information, please visit:
translations.Connecting Collabora Online Single Click: Connecting Collabora Online Single Click with Nginx
translations.Could not establish connection to the Co: Could not establish connection to the Collabora Online server.
translations.Collabora Online should use the same pro: Collabora Online should use the same protocol as the server installation.
translations.Please configure a Collabora Online serv: Please configure a Collabora Online server to start editing documents
translations.Nextcloud Office requires a separate ser: Nextcloud Office requires a separate server running Collabora Online to provide editing capabilities.
translations.Collabora Online requires a separate ser: Collabora Online requires a separate server acting as a WOPI-like Client to provide editing capabilities.
translations.Use the built-in CODE - Collabora Online: Use the built-in CODE - Collabora Online Development Edition
translations.Easy to install, for home use or small g: Easy to install, for home use or small groups. A bit slower than a standalone server and without the advanced scalability features.
translations.This installation does not have a built: This installation does not have a built in server.
Install it from the App Store.
translations.If the installation from the App Store f: If the installation from the App Store fails, you can still do that manually using this command:
translations.You can use a demo server provided by Co: You can use a demo server provided by Collabora and other service providers for giving Collabora Online a try.
translations.Your Nextcloud setup is not capable of c: Your Nextcloud setup is not capable of connecting to the demo servers because:
translations.it is unreachable from the internet (pos: it is unreachable from the internet (possibly because of a firewall, or lack of port forwarding)
translations.For use cases like this, we offer instru: For use cases like this, we offer instructions for a
translations.Documents opened with the demo server co: Documents opened with the demo server configured will be sent to a 3rd party server. Only use this for evaluating Collabora Online.
translations.Please make sure you understand that the: Please make sure you understand that the following will happen if you set up the Collabora Online demo.
translations.The service will send users documents to: The service will send users documents to Collabora and/or third party demo servers.
translations.This service is not intended for product: This service is not intended for production use, hence the documents will show tile watermarks.
translations.The demo service may be under heavy load: The demo service may be under heavy load, and its performance is not representative in any way of the performance of an on-premise installation.
translations.These servers are used for testing and d: These servers are used for testing and development, and may run test versions of the software. As such they may crash, burn, and re-start without warning.
translations.The users documents will not be retained: The users documents will not be retained by a third party after their session completes except in exceptional circumstances. By using the service, the user gives permission for Collabora engineers to exceptionally use such document data, solely for the purpose of providing, optimizing and improving Collabora Online. Such document data will remain confidential to Collabora and/or any third party providing a demo server.
translations.At the first use and after an update, ea: At the first use and after an update, each user will get the warning, explaining all the above.
translations.I agree, and use the demo server: I agree, and use the demo server
translations.I will setup my own server: I will setup my own server
translations.Use Office Open XML (OOXML) instead of O: Use Office Open XML (OOXML) instead of OpenDocument Format (ODF) by default for new files
translations.{productName} is enabled for all users b: {productName} is enabled for all users by default. When this setting is active, only members of the specified groups can use it.
translations.All users can edit documents with {produ: All users can edit documents with {productName} by default. When this setting is active, only the members of the specified groups can edit, whereas the others can only view documents.
translations.Canonical webroot, in case there are mul: Canonical webroot, in case there are multiple, for Collabora to use. Provide the one with least restrictions. Eg: Use non-shibbolised webroot if this instance is accessed by both shibbolised and non-shibbolised webroots. You can ignore this setting if only one webroot is used to access this instance.
translations.List of IPV4 and IPV6 IP-addresses and s: List of IPV4 and IPV6 IP-addresses and subnets that are allowed to perform requests of the WOPI endpoints. If no allow list is specified all hosts will be allowed. E.g. 10.0.0.20,10.0.4.0/24
translations.Secure view enables you to secure docume: Secure view enables you to secure documents by embedding a watermark
translations.The settings only apply to compatible of: The settings only apply to compatible office files that are opened in Nextcloud Office
translations.The following options within Nextcloud O: The following options within Nextcloud Office will be disabled: Copy, Download, Export, Print
translations.Files may still be downloadable through: Files may still be downloadable through Nextcloud unless restricted otherwise through sharing or access control settings
translations.Files may still be downloadable via WOPI: Files may still be downloadable via WOPI requests if WOPI settings are not correctly configured
translations.Previews will be blocked for watermarked: Previews will be blocked for watermarked files to not leak the first page of documents
translations.Show watermark for users of groups: Show watermark for users of groups
translations.Show watermark for read only shares: Show watermark for read only shares
translations.Show watermark for shares without downlo: Show watermark for shares without download permission
translations.Show watermark for all link shares: Show watermark for all link shares
translations.Show watermark for download hidden share: Show watermark for download hidden shares
translations.Show watermark for read only link shares: Show watermark for read only link shares
translations.Show watermark on link shares with speci: Show watermark on link shares with specific system tags
Contact {0} to get an own installation.
translations.Make sure to set this URL: {url} in the: Make sure to set this URL: {url} in the coolwsd.xml file of your Collabora Online server to ensure the added fonts get loaded automatically.
translations.Connect your Zotero account to make use: Connect your Zotero account to make use of references within Office.
translations.You can generate an account key here:: You can generate an account key here:
translations.Failed to set Zotero API key: Failed to set Zotero API key
translations.Could not find any section in the docume: Could not find any section in the document
translations.Select file or folder to link to: Select file or folder to link to
translations.Starting the built-in CODE server failed: Starting the built-in CODE server failed
translations.Failed to load {productName} - please tr: Failed to load {productName} - please try again later
translations.Built-in CODE Server is starting up shor: Built-in CODE Server is starting up shortly, please wait.
translations.Built-in CODE Server is restarting, plea: Built-in CODE Server is restarting, please wait.
translations.Error: Cannot find the AppImage, please: Error: Cannot find the AppImage, please reinstall the Collabora Online Built-in server.
translations.Error: Unable to make the AppImage execu: Error: Unable to make the AppImage executable, please setup a standalone server.
translations.Error: Exec disabled in PHP, please enab: Error: Exec disabled in PHP, please enable it, or setup a standalone server.
translations.Error: Not running on x86-64 or ARM64 (a: Error: Not running on x86-64 or ARM64 (aarch64) Linux, please setup a standalone server.
translations.Error: The fontconfig library is not ins: Error: The fontconfig library is not installed on your server, please install it or setup a standalone server.
translations.Error: Not running on glibc-based Linux,: Error: Not running on glibc-based Linux, please setup a standalone server.
translations.Error: Cannot start the Collabora Online: Error: Cannot start the Collabora Online Built-in server, please setup a standalone one.
translations.Please choose your nickname to continue: Please choose your nickname to continue as guest user.
translations.Please enter the filename to store the d: Please enter the filename to store the document as.
translations.When opening a file locally, the documen: When opening a file locally, the document will close for all users currently viewing the document.
translations.If the file does not open in your local: If the file does not open in your local editor, make sure the Nextcloud desktop app is installed and open and try again.
translations.Failed to connect to {productName}. Plea: Failed to connect to {productName}. Please try again later or contact your server administrator.
translations.The file should now open locally. If you: The file should now open locally. If you don't see this happening, make sure that the desktop client is installed on your system.
translations.Failed to revert the document to older v: Failed to revert the document to older version
translations.Failed to update the Zotero API key: Failed to update the Zotero API key
translations.Built-in CODE server failed to start: Built-in CODE server failed to start
translations.Please enter the filename for the new do: Please enter the filename for the new document
translations.Templates inside of this directory will: Templates inside of this directory will be added to the template selector of Nextcloud Office.
To use Zotero specify your API key here. You can create your API key in your
translations.This instance does not support Zotero, b: This instance does not support Zotero, because the feature is missing or disabled. Please contact the administration.
translations.Saved with error: Collabora Online shoul: Saved with error: Collabora Online should use the same protocol as the server installation.
translations.Nextcloud Office requires a seperate ser: Nextcloud Office requires a seperate server running Collabora Online to provide editing capabilities.
translations.Collabora Online requires a seperate ser: Collabora Online requires a seperate server acting as a WOPI-like Client to provide editing capabilities.
translations.All users can edit documents with {produ: All users can edit documents with {productName} by default. When this setting is active, only the members of the specified groups can edit and the others can only view documents.
translations.Collabora Online is enabled for all user: Collabora Online is enabled for all users by default. When this setting is active, only members of the specified groups can use it.
translations.Templates inside of this directory will: Templates inside of this directory will be added to the template selector of Collabora Online.
